content.rendered:
Directed by Elamaran

Written by Elamaran

Star Suresh Chakravarthi (Tahsildar). Elamaran (Baasha). Jeyaraj (Ezhumalai). Anil Kumar (Goon Leader). Muthuraman (Inspector). Aadukalam Naren (Assistant Comissioner of Police). Velu Prabhakaran (Jamaath leader). Radha Ravi (Mr. Senguttuvan, Chief Minister). Pasi Sathya (Saroja Friend). Seshu (Baasha’s uncle). Lollu Sabha Seshu (Baasha’s Uncle). Vijaya (Saroja). Charles Vinoth (Subramaniam, MLA Candidate)

Language Tamil

Producers Adam Bhava. Mrs. Adam Bhava. Mahesh

Production Moon Pictures
